subject: P1 wheel
description_text:
Will the p1 I think it’s called work with a moza r9v3 ? Is a mag link or
what would I have to modify it at all

conversations.body_text: Hi shaun ramsey,    Which product are you enquiring about? Is it this steering wheel? Would you kindly provide a photograph?

Yes, that's it.

On Tue, Nov 18, 2025 at 8:24 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi shaun ramsey,  This steering wheel features a universal 70mm bolt pattern. You may wish to verify whether your Moza R9v3 is compatible with this bolt pattern.

That’s fine but I’m worried about connecting it . Does it have a mag link
for usb

On Tue, Nov 18, 2025 at 8:34 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi shaun ramsey,    This steering wheel features a USB connection at one end and an aviation plug at the other, with no magnetic attachment support.
